alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 4:07PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Laramie County through 500 PM MDT... At 407 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Federal, or 18 miles west of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Hillsdale, Federal, Crystal Lake Reservoir, Crystal Lake Campground, Granite Springs Reservoir, Ranchettes, Granite Springs Campground, Warren AFB, Frontier Park, Whitaker, North Cheyenne, Warren Af Base, South Greeley and Fox Farm-College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
